casebody.data:
In re ADOPTION OF ANDERSON. No. 448PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 28, 2005. Michael S. Harrell, Raleigh, for Michael Avery.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of March 2005 by Petitioner for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Petitioner (Unidentified Adoptive Parents) shall have up to and including the 3rd day of May 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of March 2005."
